# GPU Environment for Design B - RTX4070
# TensorFlow 1.x with GPU support for modern CUDA

# Core TensorFlow GPU (compatible with RTX4070)
# Note: 1.15.0 is the last version of TensorFlow 1.x
tensorflow-gpu==1.15.0

# Dependencies
numpy==1.16.6
scipy==1.1.0

scikit-image==0.14.5

tqdm==4.36.1
